title.narrative: Regional and country-specific research commissioned to support effective policy decisions and key programme challenges in the East Africa region

description.narrative: This activity (Regional and country-specific research commissioned to support effective policy decisions and key programme challenges in the East Africa region) is a component of Strategic Research and Evidence for the East Africa region reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £9,266,792. This component benefits South of Sahara, regional, and works in the following sector(s): Research/scientific institutions. , with the following implementing partners: PwC Kenya. The start date is 10-03-2016 and the end date is 30-11-2020.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2016 Quarter 1
